description:
Whether your gliding down perfectly parallel classic tracks or skating along groomed trails, this jacket will help you hold onto your hard earned warmth. Made using recycled materials, the Aware softshell highlights B Daehlie’s progress to reduce their ecological footprint. Paneled construction places insulation where you need it most, stretch in the most dynamic areas, and breathable wicking material everywhere else. Designed to keep you comfortable while pushing the pace in sub-zero conditions, this jacket won’t let cold get in the way of that next PR.

  • 3-layer polyester stretch fleece has a polyurethane membrane to seal out wet weather
  • Quilted chest panels use Thermore® Ecodown synthetic insulation that gives a new life to single-use plastic water bottles
  • Synthetic insulation is light, compressible, and even stays warm when wet
  • PFC-free DWR finish sheds light rain and snow
  • Articulated sleeves move with you as you use your poles
  • Strategically placed stretch panels add improved ventilation and movement
  • Dual zippered hand pockets keep necessities close and safe
  • Adjustable hem and elasticised cuffs help keep the warm in and the cool out
name: B Daehlie Aware Jacket - Women's
